name: I went home
description:
Home doesn't last forever... Home can mean many things... ...or people... Love them while they're there... I went home.

Two buttons (left and right arrow keys).

Try to figure through the personal story before the music ends to understand how it all matches up.


Game design, programming, music composition - David Klingler
One recording is of David's friend Gary Whaley on piano, but playing a piece David composed. Made during Global Game Jam 2019.
